title: Weird Ping Issues
body:
Whenever I start a game of league, the game basically decides out of 3 options to give me either, 50-70 ping (my normal ping), 200-300 ping or 400-600 ping. Closing and opening the game(not the launcher), will "reroll" and give me 1 of these 3 again. So every game, if i don't start with the right ping, I have to keep restarting my game until I get the good ping. I don't know how many times I've missed the first few minutes of the game because of these, causing my team and sometimes myself to tilt and cause the loss. {{item:3070}} 

Sometimes I also randomly just get disconnected with the "Attempting to Reconnect...." message, which again, requires me to restart my game or else it would just stay like that forever.

replies.body: It sounds like you're having a pretty unstable connection reaching the game servers, resulting in high spikes like that and ultimately disconnecting.  You should run through each step of the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot and fix this up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
